channel.title: Need a hoster please
channel.description:
Well i need a hoster to run my server, if you are willing to help me, i got many ideas, contact me on my msn davilardi@hotmail.com if u cant host 24/7 you are very welcome, i have plans for a big community and donations will go to you, if we get some, please help me....
thanks
